hero.subtitle: 12 years old · Aspiring Film Actor
hero.description: I am a 12-year-old student with a passion for art, orchestral music, and film. Although I don't have acting experience yet, I want to convey emotions through my acting and express the stories of various characters.

background.title: Background
background.description: I was born in 2013 in Cheongju, North Chungcheong Province, South Korea, and moved to Germany in 2018. After attending kindergarten (Kita) and elementary school, I am currently in 7th grade at a Gymnasium (secondary school). At first, I didn't know any German, which made it difficult to adapt to life in Germany, and I missed Korea a lot. Now that I've become better at German, I sometimes worry that my Korean has become less fluent.

experience.title: Music Activities
experience.description: I play the double bass in both my school orchestra and a local orchestra. Through music, I am developing teamwork and expressiveness, and I believe these experiences will help me in acting as well.

interests.title: Interests
interests.description: I especially love drawing and share my artwork on Instagram (@imjune0_0). I also enjoy playing the double bass and exploring animations and cultures from different countries. These diverse experiences will add depth and richness to my acting.
